mapper.select: select a.no as unitNo, a.name as unitName, a.eng_name as unitEngName, a.price, a.hp, a.armor, a.resistance, a.attack, a.speed, a.range, a.dps, a.unit_icon as unitIcon, a.preview_icon as previewIcon, a.tier, c.name as speciesName, c.icon as speciesIcon, d.name as jobName, d.icon as jobIcon from unit a join unit_species b on a.no=b.unit_no join species c on b.species_no=c.no join job d on a.job_no=d.no order by a.tier;
